amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund by $175 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund by $175 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 191 (Roll no. 479).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 191 (Roll no. 479).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Cohen.
